players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I am shocked Bob is dead. We need to stay calm and share any information we have. Who saw anything suspicious last night?"
You: "I found evidence last night: I investigated Diana and they are the mafioso. We should arrest Diana now."
Charlie: "I don't trust immediate accusations. Alice, what's your investigation process and did you tell anyone else? Diana, how do you respond to Alice's claim?"

Diana: "I didn't expect Alice to come forward so quickly. If she truly investigated me, why didn't she share details before the vote? Charlie, do you remember whom Alice spoke to or how she conducted the investigation?"
Charlie: "Alice, your claim is specific — you said you investigated Diana. Can you tell us who you visited and how you conducted the investigation? Diana, any details that contradict Alice's story?"
You: "I investigated Diana last night and my investigation result is clear: Diana is the mafioso. I visited Diana alone and learned their role — I have no reason to lie; arrest Diana now."
